dt: {bc}a {d_link|commissioned officer|commissioned officer} in the army, air force, or marine corps ranking above a {d_link|lieutenant colonel|lieutenant colonel} and below a {d_link|brigadier general|brigadier general}
{bc}a minor {d_link|titular|titular:1} official of a state especially in southern or midland U.S.

et: alteration of {it}coronel{/it}, from Middle French, modification of Old Italian {it}colonnello{/it} column of soldiers, colonel, diminutive of {it}colonna{/it} column, from Latin {it}columna{/it} {dx_ety}see {dxt|column||}{/dx_ety}
shortdef: a commissioned officer in the army, air force, or marine corps ranking above a lieutenant colonel and below a brigadier general
a minor titular official of a state especially in southern or midland U.S. —used as an honorific title

dt: {bc}a pompous person with out-of-date or ultraconservative views

et: {it}Colonel Blimp{/it}, cartoon character created by David Low
shortdef: a pompous person with out-of-date or ultraconservative views; broadly : reactionary

et: from the eagle serving as insignia for this rank
from the eagle serving as insignia of the rank

dt: {bc}a commissioned officer in the army, air force, or marine corps ranking above a major and below a colonel

shortdef: a commissioned officer in the army, air force, or marine corps ranking above a major and below a colonel
